actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.
Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

official_title: A concurrent resolution providing for an adjournment of the House from July 1 to July 7, 1987, and a recess of the Senate from July 1 or 2, 1987 to July 7, 1987.

summary.text: Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from July 1 to July 7, 1987, and a recess of the Senate from July 1 or 2 to July 7, 1987.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for an adjournment of the House from July 1 to July 7, 1987, and a recess of the Senate from July 1 or 2, 1987 to July 7, 1987.
